p.i: Weapon (hand cannon), very rare, requires attunement

description.p: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Firefly. When you kill a hostile creature with a critical hit using this weapon the target explodes in a sudden conflagration, as if a fireball spell (save DC 10 + Your Proficiency Bonus) were cast centered on it.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
Ghostbuster. While holding this weapon, you can see into the Ethereal Plane within 60 feet of you. Furthermore, attacks with this weapon can hit targets on the Ethereal Plane.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Fireball. While you are holding this weapon, you can use your action to cast the fireball spell (save DC 10 + Your Proficiency Bonus) from it. Once used this property can't be used again until the following dawn.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

Prism. While you are holding this weapon you can take a bonus action to change its damage type to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. This effect lasts until you use this feature again or you dismiss it as a bonus action.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

When you score a critical hit with this weapon during combat, you can forgo rolling any number of additional damage dice granted by your Bad Medicine feature. When you do so, choose another creature within 10 feet of the original target and roll the forgone dice. The chosen creature regains hit points equal to the result + your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1 hit point). This property has no effect on Constructs or Undead.
You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
Kingslayer When you score a critical hit against a creature that has the Legendary Resistance trait with this weapon, that trait is suppressed until the end of your next turn.

p.i: Inscription: "If it ain't broke, break it."
Weapon (hand cannon), rare, requires attunement by a creature of lawful alignment

description.p: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon

Death Sentence. If a creature that isn't attuned to this weapon attempts to make an attack with it, the weapon casts the Disintegrate spell (save DC 10 + that Creature's Proficiency Bonus) on that creature before the attack is made.
Underdog. When you hit a Large or larger creature with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an additional 1d6 damage of the weapon's type.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
Sureshot. You ignore the loading and reload properties of this weapon.

p.i: Weapon (any firearm), very rare, requires attunement by a gunslinger

description.p: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Whenever you score a critical hit with this weapon you can regain 2 expended Grit Points instead of 1.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
Curtain Call. When you score a critical hit with this weapon the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC 10 + Your Proficiency Bonus) or be reduced to 0 hit points.
You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
Hawkeye. Attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls made with this weapon.
Hawkeye. Attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls made with this weapon.

Prism. While you are holding this weapon you can take a bonus action to change its damage type to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. This effect lasts until you use this feature again or you dismiss it as a bonus action.
Sureshot. You ignore the loading and reload properties of this weapon.
Underdog. When you hit a Large or larger creature with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an additional 1d6 damage of the weapon's type.

Death Sentence. If a creature that isn't attuned to this weapon attempts to make an attack with it, the weapon casts the Disintegrate spell (save DC 10 + that Creature's Proficiency Bonus) on that creature before the attack is made.

Fireball. While you are holding this weapon, you can use your action to cast the fireball spell (save DC 10 + Your Proficiency Bonus) from it. Once used this property can't be used again until the following dawn.
Ghostbuster. While holding this weapon, you can see into the Ethereal Plane within 60 feet of you. Furthermore, attacks with this weapon can hit targets on the Ethereal Plane.

Firefly. When you kill a hostile creature with a critical hit using this weapon the target explodes in a sudden conflagration, as if a fireball spell (save DC 10 + Your Proficiency Bonus) were cast centered on it.
Kingslayer When you score a critical hit against a creature that has the Legendary Resistance trait with this weapon, that trait is suppressed until the end of your next turn.
Curtain Call. When you score a critical hit with this weapon the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC 10 + Your Proficiency Bonus) or be reduced to 0 hit points.
The standard ammunition used by Pistols and Rifles.
The standard ammunition used by Shotguns.
Heat Seeker. When you attack a creature that isn’t a Construct or an Undead using this ammunition, you gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll, and the target gains no benefit from cover for the attack.

Incendiary. Attacks using this ammunition that hit deal fire damage instead of the weapon’s normal damage type, cause the target to start burning (1d6), and ignite flammable objects that aren’t being worn or carried.
